subject: Rugby
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: New Zealand successfully embraced the pressure as host in 2011, and England will need to do the same thing this year if it hopes to make it out of this year’s Pool of Death.
snippet: New Zealand successfully embraced the pressure as host in 2011, and England will need to do the same thing this year if it hopes to make it out of this year’s Pool of Death.
